literally cannot stress enough how fun this is
Valve continua y termina su formato episódico con este Episodio 2 que termina con un final brutal y abierto que deja con muchas ganas de más... Algún día Valve tendrá que sacar Half-Life 3...
Same as half life 2 but different
We desperately need a sequel to this game.. But still, fantastic game. 10/10.
If you like action you get plenty. Its not boring by a long shot. Puzzles of every sort await. Great shooter and improvising welcome.

Liked it better than episode 1. It was a lot longer and it was outside instead of in the city again, which was cool. Great continuation of the story but left on a huge cliffhanger! I need the next one.
GNOME CHOMPSKY IN SPACE MOMENT, fuck striders
Honestly, if you haven't played this already, what are you even doing?
Огонь. Любимая игра, я начал ещё с перовой))

比第一章流程要长，剧情也比第一章有更多的料，整个故事牵扯到的人物越来越多，可能要出好几部才能讲完。

出现了一种可以控制引力的生物机器人，行动迅速还会飞，还能吸取人脑的记忆，压迫感比前作要强。

掌握了黑科技的戈登，干翻一波又一波巨型机器人那里，玩得太爽了。

结局和前作一样令人印象深刻，戛然而止。故事有多精彩，玩不到续作的玩家就有多遗憾。

[h1]Shut up and take my money, Half-Life 3 ! ! ![/h1]

I was a huge fan of Half Life 2 when it came out, but I moved overseas and for various reasons didn't end up playing the episodes back when they came out. I've been revisiting it all now and while I thought Episode One was good, Episode Two is truly awesome. It totally exceeds expectations even all these years later. I really look forward to Half Life 3 one day, or anything that takes the story timeline onward.
“我没有恶意，弗里曼博士，但你来之前这里真的很安生的。”
出了蚂蚁洞，头皮已经没知觉了

传送门3
以及饼画了就没有消息的求生之路3和求生之路3
gioco fantastico per quanto vecchio, nulla da dire.

Just a Cliffhanger!! Can't wait for 3. If it comes out.
Hopefully it does

After I finished the game, I just sit back a thought to myself that Half-Life 2: Episode One and Episode Two creature so complex and epic story that it can actually be considered as Half-Life 3! Just split into two parts!
It has emotions, the heart, the action and of course that GIGANTIC climax at the end which was super hard and super annoying but once you manage to beat it, you realise that it wasn't as bad as you thought!
And that's exactly what I felt!
I can officially say that I want Half-Life 3 :)

il miglior franchise a cui io abbia mai giocato. Chi non ha giocato tutti gli altri half life si sta perdendo tanta roba lo consiglio a tutti. L'unica pecca è che 15 anni dopo non hanno ancora rilasciato Hlaf life 2:Ep3 che sarebbe stato quello definitivo. Spero che uscirà presto, di certò io lo comprerò day one.
what a lovely ending. so wholesome big chung 100 keanu reaves

This is one of those games that seriously deserves a sequel.
gaben pls

Damn near made me cry. I finished half life 1 through episode 2 and all of them are works of art. Sure they each have their problems, but man I love these games. Buy and play all of them. Do it. You won't regret it

2편의 뒤를 이은 작품. 에피소드 1보다 플레이 타임이 늘어났고 달리기와 손전등이 같은 에너지를 쓰지 않아 플레이가 편리해졌고 핲라 2 물조심 쳅터 처럼 자동차로 긴박하고 스피드하게 진행되는 전투가 가장 인상깊었다. 마지막 스트라이더와 벌어지는 긴장감 있는 디팬스형 전투는 게임의 하이라이트를 장식했다 말해도 과언이 아니다. 

단점은 한국어 음성 지원이 안되지만 자막은 한국어로 나오는데 이게 번역이 심각한 수준이다.

hl2 ne kadar crack oynasamda ep1 ve ep2yi aldım tek diyeceğim efsane bir hikayeye sahip [spoiler] Eli ölmeseydi iyiydi aq iyi adamdı neyse o borealisi görmeden ölmek yok Gaben[/spoiler]

本作是HL2EP1的续作，讲述了HL2EP1 戈登和Alyx逃出17号城之后的故事。令人遗憾的是，如大家所见，这是半条命目前可观测到的最后一部PC作品了，他为我们挖了很多坑，却时隔十几年都没有填上。
本作没有专门围绕重力枪设计的大段流程（有需要重力枪的Boss战），而且可能要经历一些令人不快/生理不适的探险过程，而此外本作的成就设计颇为硬核，推荐玩家们在熟悉流程之后进行挑战，一些收集类的成就建议配合Steam指南来完成。

Klasik Valve kalitesinde güzel bir devam bölümü olmuş.
Bazı şeyleri de belirtmem gerekirse oyun da neredeyse 1 saat 1.5 saat araba ile devam ediyoruz genellikle araç kullanmayı pek sevmem ama bura da bir tane aksiyon kısmından sonra sadece herhangi bir yere seyahet etmek için kullandığımız için çok da beni irite etmedi.
Oynun son kısmı ise ucu açık bir şekilde bırakılması iyi olmamış ardından kendileri beklentiyi karşılamayacakları için 3. oynun gelmiceğini belirtseler de Half Life Alxy de birnevi 3. oyun için ışık yakılmıştı.
Umarım gine bir efsane ortaya koyarlar.

So, let me get this straight Eli wants Gordon to fuck his daughter?


Now slowly turn around and handover those awards. Slowly!
A masterpiece of a game! Every gamer should play this game at some point in their life. I can't wait for Episode 3! Hehe ;)
Uno de los mejores juegos de toda mi vida, como leí una vez: Si no lo haz jugado, no se que esperas!
The graphics got a nice upgrade in this installment. Everything about this is just iconic and fun. I liked some of the wave-based shooter elements.
Прекрасное продолжение игры с неожиданной концовкой.

Have you ever played a game that was so good you didn't want it to end? That's half life 2. I'm sad it's over especially on that clifhanger but I enjoyed the entire journey, never a slow moment or boring exposition. That final mission before the Gut wrenching end was one of the best levels I've played in a long time.
